typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'xml',
	container: 'blob01',
	folderPath: 'airbus/AIRBUS-RUAG-20200622-A320-XML-EZ20181205003-1-1',
	fileName: 'O_DRWST.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> ODRWST
ODRWST foldDown(unroll(A.IXOFFEFF.row, A.IXOFFEFF.row),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(mapColumn(
		CDATE,
		COCODE,
		EFFTYPE,
		INDUSSTDCODE,
		LOLEGACYNUMBER,
		LONUMBER,
		LOTYPE,
		RANGE,
		STDCODE,
		UDATE,
		VERSIONCODE
	)) ~> ODRWSTSINK
